original_text: The throne had six steps, and the throne had a round top, and on each side of the seat were armrests and two lions standing beside the armrests,
korean_text: 그 보좌에는 여섯 층계가 있고 보좌 뒤에 둥근 머리가 있고 앉는 자리 양쪽에는 팔걸이가 있고 팔걸이 곁에는 사자가 하나씩 서 있으며

sentences.original_text: and the throne had a round top
sentences.korean_translation: 그 옥좌는 둥근 윗부분을 가지고 있었다

sentences.original_text: and on each side of the seat were armrests
and two lions standing beside the armrests
sentences.korean_translation: 팔걸이 옆에는 두 마리의 사자가 서 있었다
